CallToolResult(content=[TextContent(type='text', text='[{"table_name":"customers","creation_sql":"CREATE TABLE customers (\n        id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,\n        name TEXT NOT NULL,\n        email TEXT UNIQUE,\n        phone TEXT,\n        address TEXT,\n        customer_type TEXT CHECK(customer_type IN ('individual', 'business')),\n        registration_date DATE DEFAULT (date('now')),\n        total_purchases INTEGER DEFAULT 0,\n        last_purchase_date DATE\n    )"},{"table_name":"products","creation_sql":"CREATE TABLE products (\n        id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,\n        name TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE,\n        price INTEGER NOT NULL CHECK(price > 0),\n        stock INTEGER NOT NULL CHECK(stock >= 0),\n        category TEXT NOT NULL,\n        description TEXT,\n        created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,\n        updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP\n    )"},{"table_name":"sales","creation_sql":"CREATE TABLE sales (\n        id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,\n        product_id INTEGER NOT NULL,\n        quantity INTEGER NOT NULL CHECK(quantity > 0),\n        unit_price INTEGER NOT NULL CHECK(unit_price > 0),\n        total_amount INTEGER NOT NULL CHECK(total_amount > 0),\n        sale_date DATE NOT NULL,\n        customer_id INTEGER NOT NULL,\n        sales_person TEXT,\n        notes TEXT,\n        FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products (id),\n        FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers (id)\n    )"}]', annotations=None, meta=None)], structured_content={'result': [{'table_name': 'customers', 'creation_sql': "CREATE TABLE customers (
        id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
        name TEXT NOT NULL,
        email TEXT UNIQUE,
        phone TEXT,
        address TEXT,
        customer_type TEXT CHECK(customer_type IN ('individual', 'business')),
        registration_date DATE DEFAULT (date('now')),
        total_purchases INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
        last_purchase_date DATE
    )"}, {'table_name': 'products', 'creation_sql': 'CREATE TABLE products (
        id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
        name TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE,
        price INTEGER NOT NULL CHECK(price > 0),
        stock INTEGER NOT NULL CHECK(stock >= 0),
        category TEXT NOT NULL,
        description TEXT,
        created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
        updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
    )'}, {'table_name': 'sales', 'creation_sql': 'CREATE TABLE sales (
        id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
        product_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
        quantity INTEGER NOT NULL CHECK(quantity > 0),
        unit_price INTEGER NOT NULL CHECK(unit_price > 0),
        total_amount INTEGER NOT NULL CHECK(total_amount > 0),
        sale_date DATE NOT NULL,
        customer_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
        sales_person TEXT,
        notes TEXT,
        FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products (id),
        FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers (id)
    )'}]}, data=[Root(), Root(), Root()], is_error=False)
